title: Which Kpop group has the best concept? - Quora

response.answer_text: as biased as it is: NCT have one of the best concepts. It’s unique, it’s new, it’s interesting. Although rather complicated, once you understand it, nct can be a really fun group to stan/listen to. They’re divided into 3 sub-units: NCT 127, NCT DREAM and WAYV. This way, it’s hard to miss a member or not know about them since they have all been promoted under a unit. I like to consider NCT U a way in which members can unite and promote songs despite not being in their designated sub-unit. For example: Taeyong and Ten have promoted ‘Baby don’t stop’ as NCT U since they’re both in different sub-units. Another example of this is ‘Yestoday’ (Taeyong, Mark, Doyoung and Lucas) and ‘Timeless’ (Taeil, Doyoung and Jaehyun. Even though they’re all in NCT 127, it is promoted as NCT U since not all 127 members participate in this). I feel like NCT is a really good group in terms of interacting with fans too. They’re constantly putting out content (Pretty much every day) on a variety of different platforms (vlive, twitter, youtube, Instagram). So if you like watching idols do things for their fans, I’d recommend NCT. ATEEZ have a pretty interesting concept going on. ‘Hala Hala’ and ‘Say my Name’ have the same dark, mysterious edge to them. While ‘Pirate King’ and ‘Treasure’ bring a more bright and paradise-like vibe to them. These concepts are all, while maintaining their distinct sound of electric kind of beats. Also, the members, (although I don’t know much about them), seem like a funny and friendly bunch.

Well, being an ARMY it’s obviously BTS for me. However, loving Bangtan so much aside…I’d say that it’s still them. Just think of the storyline they’ve had ever since and how they’re making their ARMYs crazy on how to come up with good theories and you’ll see and would probably agree with me. Their concepts are bomb and there are lots you could learn from it. (Watch out for the upcoming SMERALDO Books from BU!) aaand stream DNA! Hehehe
